display_long_description:
You’re the legendary stylist at Crazy Salon, a one-of-a-kind spray painting salon in town—here to serve customers of every stripe. Your job? Deck out these picky patrons with creative spray work that brings their wildest ideas to life.


**Serve Picky Customers with Wild Requests**

[media]

Hone your spray skills in Career Mode - over 40 hilarious characters are waiting—from Banana Boy to Onion Nerd, from Mushroom Junior to Potato Bro —each with a quirky ask: turn them into a swashbuckling pirate, a cheeky prisoner, or a bold superhero! Watch them light up with joy… or squirm in pain as you work your magic (or chaos).


**Unleash Creativity with Insane Sprayers**

[media]

Go wild in Creative Mode - choose a customer (or "victim") and be creative with Spraypainter, Power Washer, Hair Grower, Flame Thrower, Freeze Blaster, Plastic Shaper—plus tons of add-ons like different color cans, various spray nozzles, anoying pollution devices, and wild hair samples. Mix and match to craft one-of-a-kind looks!


**Make Viral Video with Extra Fun Unlocked**

[media]

Earn cash to unlock even more tools beyond sprayers: snap hilarious Polaroids of your customers’ funniest moments, zap them with a stun baton, sock them with boxing gloves, whack (or save) them with a giant hammer—This is the perfect stage to make your next viral short videos.

We put our heart and soul into this game, and finally early access version is out now - please let us know what you think!
